sqlMap.sql:
SELECT SUBT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , T.PRJ_ID , T.DPL_ID , T.DPL_NM , T.DPL_VER , T.DPL_DT , T.DPL_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T.DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_NM , T.DPL_STS_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00001', T.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , T.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00003', T.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , SF_REPLACE_ALL(T.DPL_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS DPL_DESC , T.PROCESS_ID , T.PROCESS_NM , T.FLOW_ID , T.FLOW_NM , T.REQ_ID , T.REQ_ORD , TO_NUMBER(IFNULL(SF_REPLACE_ALL(T.REQ_ORD ,'[^0-9]',''),0)) AS REQ_ORD_NUMBER , T.REQ_NO , T.REQ_NM , SF_REPLACE_ALL(T.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS REQ_DESC , T.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T.REQ_CHARGER_ID, '1') AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , T.REQ_USR_ID , COALESCE(T.REQ_USR_NM, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , T.REQ_DTM , T.REQ_ST_DTM , T.REQ_ED_DTM , T.REQ_ST_DU_DTM , T.REQ_ED_DU_DTM , T.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', T.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , T.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', T.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', T.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , T.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , T.REQ_FP , T.REQ_EX_FP , T.SCL_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00011', T.SCL_CD, '1') AS SCL_NM , T.PIA_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', T.PIA_CD, '1') AS PIA_NM , T.LAB_INP , T.MILESTONE_ID , T.ORG_REQ_ID , T.REG_DTM , T.REG_USR_ID , T.REG_USR_IP , T.MODIFY_DTM , T.MODIFY_USR_ID , T.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.DPL_ID , W.DPL_NM , W.DPL_VER , W.DPL_DT , W.DPL_USR_ID , W.DPL_STS_CD , W.DPL_TYPE_CD , W.DPL_DESC , Z.PROCESS_ID , V.PROCESS_NM , Y.FLOW_ID , Y.FLOW_NM , Z.REQ_ID , X.REQ_ORD , X.REQ_NO , X.REQ_NM , X.REQ_DESC , X.REQ_CHARGER_ID , X.REQ_USR_ID , X.REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(X.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , X.REQ_TYPE_CD , X.REQ_PRO_TYPE , X.REQ_NEW_TYPE , X.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , X.REQ_FP , X.REQ_EX_FP , X.SCL_CD , X.PIA_CD , X.LAB_INP , X.MILESTONE_ID , X.ORG_REQ_ID , TO_CHAR(X.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , X.REG_USR_ID , X.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(X.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , X.MODIFY_USR_ID , X.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1100 Z INNER JOIN FLW1100 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = Y.PROCESS_ID AND Z.FLOW_ID = Y.FLOW_ID) INNER JOIN REQ4100 X ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.REQ_ID = X.REQ_ID) INNER JOIN DPL1000 W ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = W.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = W.DPL_ID) INNER JOIN FLW1000 V ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = V.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = V.PROCESS_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND Z.REQ_ID = #reqId# ) T ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1 AND UPPER( SUBT1.REQ_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.REQ_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.REQ_USR_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.REQ_CHARGER_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.PROCESS_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.FLOW_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.REQ_NO ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( SUBT1.REQ_ORD ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND SUBT1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchCd# AND SUBT1.REQ_NEW_TYPE = #searchCd# AND SUBT1.REQ_TYPE_CD = #searchCd# ORDER BY SUBT1.REQ_ORD_NUMBER DESC, SUBT1.REQ_DTM, SUBT1.REQ_ID

SELECT SUBT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , T.PRJ_ID , T.PROCESS_ID , T.PROCESS_NM , T.FLOW_ID , T.FLOW_NM , T.REQ_ID , T.REQ_ORD , TO_NUMBER(IFNULL(SF_REPLACE_ALL(T.REQ_ORD ,'[^0-9]',''),0)) AS REQ_ORD_NUMBER , T.REQ_NO , T.REQ_NM , sf_Replace_All (T.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '' ) AS REQ_DESC , T.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T.REQ_CHARGER_ID, '1') AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , T.REQ_USR_ID , COALESCE(T.REQ_USR_NM, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , T.REQ_DTM , T.REQ_ST_DTM , T.REQ_ED_DTM , T.REQ_ST_DU_DTM , T.REQ_ED_DU_DTM , T.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', T.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , T.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', T.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', T.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , T.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , T.REQ_FP , T.REQ_EX_FP , T.SCL_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00011', T.SCL_CD, '1') AS SCL_NM , T.PIA_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', T.PIA_CD, '1') AS PIA_NM , T.LAB_INP , T.MILESTONE_ID , T.ORG_REQ_ID , T.REG_DTM , T.REG_USR_ID , T.REG_USR_IP , T.MODIFY_DTM , T.MODIFY_USR_ID , T.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID , Z.PROCESS_ID , V.PROCESS_NM , Y.FLOW_ID , Y.FLOW_NM , Z.REQ_ID , X.REQ_ORD , X.REQ_NO , X.REQ_NM , X.REQ_DESC , X.REQ_CHARGER_ID , X.REQ_USR_ID , X.REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(X.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(X.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , X.REQ_TYPE_CD , X.REQ_PRO_TYPE , X.REQ_NEW_TYPE , X.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , X.REQ_FP , X.REQ_EX_FP , X.SCL_CD , X.PIA_CD , X.LAB_INP , X.MILESTONE_ID , X.ORG_REQ_ID , TO_CHAR(X.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , X.REG_USR_ID , X.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(X.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , X.MODIFY_USR_ID , X.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM REQ4700 Z INNER JOIN FLW1100 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.CHG_FLOW_ID IS NOT NULL AND Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = Y.PROCESS_ID AND Z.CHG_FLOW_ID = Y.FLOW_ID AND Y.FLOW_DPL_CD = '01') INNER JOIN REQ4100 X ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.REQ_ID = X.REQ_ID ) INNER JOIN FLW1000 V ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = V.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = V.PROCESS_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT DP.DPL_ID FROM DPL1100 DP WHERE 1=1 AND DP.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND DP.REQ_ID = Z.REQ_ID AND DP.PROCESS_ID = Z.PROCESS_ID AND DP.FLOW_ID = Y.FLOW_ID ) ) T WHERE 1=1 AND UPPER( T.REQ_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.REQ_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.REQ_USR_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.REQ_CHARGER_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.PROCESS_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.FLOW_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.REQ_NO ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND UPPER( T.REQ_ORD ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%' AND T.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchCd# AND T.REQ_NEW_TYPE = #searchCd# AND T.REQ_TYPE_CD = #searchCd# ) SUBT1 ORDER BY SUBT1.REQ_ORD_NUMBER DESC, SUBT1.REQ_DTM, SUBT1.REQ_ID
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DPL1100 ( PRJ_ID ,REQ_ID ,PROCESS_ID ,FLOW_ID , DPL_ID ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM ,MODIFY_USR_ID ,MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId# ,#reqId# ,#processId# ,#flowId# , #dplId# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM DPL1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.PRJ_ID , T.REQ_ID , T.PROCESS_ID , T.FLOW_ID , T.DPL_ID , T.DPL_NM , T.DPL_VER , SF_REPLACE_ALL(T.DPL_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS DPL_DESC , T.DPL_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID , A.DPL_ID , B.DPL_NM , B.DPL_VER , B.DPL_DESC , B.DPL_STS_CD FROM DPL1100 A INNER JOIN DPL1000 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# ) T
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DPL1100 A SET DPL_ID = #dplId# ,MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.DPL_ID = #beforeDplId#

UPDATE REQ4100 SET
DPL_ID = null,
DPL_ID = #dplId#,
MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId#, MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp#
WHERE PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DPL1100 ( PRJ_ID , DPL_ID , DPL_SEQ , BLD_NUM , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , JEN_ID , LIC_GRP_ID ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #dplId#, ( SELECT COALESCE( MAX(A.DPL_SEQ) , 0 ) +1 FROM DPL1100 A WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# ) , #bldNum#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, #jenId# , #licGrpId# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COALESCE(1,0) AS USE_YN FROM DPL1100 A WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# LIMIT 1
